\documentclass[border=2pt]{standalone}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage{array}
\usepackage{multirow}
\usepackage{amsbsy}
\usepackage{amssymb}
\usepackage{rotating}

\makeatletter

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}

\begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|c|}
\hline 
 & Pose Composition & Pose Inverse & Relative Pose\tabularnewline
\hline 
\hline 
\multirow{3}{*}{\begin{turn}{90}
Independent$\qquad\quad$
\end{turn}} & \multicolumn{3}{c|}{$\begin{array}{c}
\\
\mathbf{T}_{ab}=\exp\left(\boldsymbol{\xi}_{ab}^{\wedge}\right)\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ab}\quad\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ab}\in\mathrm{SE}(3),\ \boldsymbol{\xi}_{ab}^{\wedge}\in\mathfrak{se}(3)\\
\\
\end{array}$}\tabularnewline
\cline{2-4} \cline{3-4} \cline{4-4} 
 & $\begin{array}{rl}
\\
\boldsymbol{\xi}_{ij} & \sim\mathcal{N}\left(\mathbf{0},\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij}\right)\\
\boldsymbol{\xi}_{jk} & \sim\mathcal{N}\left(\mathbf{0},\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{jk}\right)\\
\\
\end{array}$ & $\boldsymbol{\xi}_{ij}\sim\mathcal{N}\left(\mathbf{0},\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij}\right)$ & $\begin{array}{rl}
\\
\boldsymbol{\xi}_{ij} & \sim\mathcal{N}\left(\mathbf{0},\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij}\right)\\
\boldsymbol{\xi}_{jk} & \sim\mathcal{N}\left(\mathbf{0},\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{jk}\right)\\
\\
\end{array}$\tabularnewline
\cline{2-4} \cline{3-4} \cline{4-4} 
 & $\begin{array}{c}
\\
\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ik}\triangleq\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{jk}\\
{\small \boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ik}\approx\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij}+\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}}\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{jk}\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}}^{\top}}\\
\\
\end{array}$ & $\begin{array}{c}
\\
\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ji}\triangleq\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}\\
\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ji}\approx\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij}\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}^{\top}\\
\\
\end{array}$ & $\begin{array}{c}
\\
\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{jk}\triangleq\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ik}\\
{\small \boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{jk}\approx\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij}\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}^{\top}+\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ik}\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}^{\top}}\\
\\
\end{array}$\tabularnewline
\hline 
\hline 
\multirow{3}{*}{\begin{turn}{90}
Relative$\qquad\qquad\qquad$
\end{turn}} & \multicolumn{3}{c|}{$\begin{array}{c}
\\
\mathbf{T}_{ab}=\exp\left(\boldsymbol{\xi}_{ab}^{\wedge}\right)\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ab}\quad\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ab}\in\mathrm{SE}(3),\ \boldsymbol{\xi}_{ab}^{\wedge}\in\mathfrak{se}(3)\\
\\
\end{array}$}\tabularnewline
\cline{2-4} \cline{3-4} \cline{4-4} 
 & $\begin{array}{c}
\\
\boldsymbol{\xi}=\left[\boldsymbol{\xi}_{ij}^{\top},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{jk}^{\top}\right]^{\top}\sim\mathcal{N}(\mathbf{0},\boldsymbol{\Sigma})\\
\boldsymbol{\Sigma}=\left[\begin{array}{cc}
\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij} & \boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij,jk}\\
\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij,jk}^{\top} & \boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{jk}
\end{array}\right]\\
\\
\end{array}$ & $\boldsymbol{\xi}_{ij}\sim\mathcal{N}\left(\mathbf{0},\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij}\right)$ & $\begin{array}{c}
\\
\boldsymbol{\xi}=\left[\boldsymbol{\xi}_{ij}^{\top},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{jk}^{\top}\right]^{\top}\sim\mathcal{N}(\mathbf{0},\boldsymbol{\Sigma})\\
\boldsymbol{\Sigma}=\left[\begin{array}{cc}
\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij} & \boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij,jk}\\
\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij,jk}^{\top} & \boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{jk}
\end{array}\right]\\
\\
\end{array}$\tabularnewline
\cline{2-4} \cline{3-4} \cline{4-4} 
 & $\begin{array}{c}
\\
\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ik}\triangleq\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{jk}\\
{\footnotesize \begin{array}{rl}
\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ik}\approx & \boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij}+\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}}\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{jk}\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}}^{\top}+\\
 & +\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij,jk}\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}}^{\top}+\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}}\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij,jk}^{\top}
\end{array}}\\
\\
\end{array}$ & $\begin{array}{c}
\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ji}\triangleq\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}\\
\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ji}\approx\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij}\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}^{\top}
\end{array}$ & $\begin{array}{c}
\\
\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{jk}\triangleq\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ik}\\
{\scriptsize \begin{array}{rl}
\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{jk}\approx & \mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij}\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}^{\top}+\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ik}\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}^{\top}+\\
 & -\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij,ik}\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}^{\top}-\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{ij,ik}^{\top}\mathrm{Ad}_{\bar{\mathbf{T}}_{ij}^{-1}}^{\top}
\end{array}}\\
\\
\end{array}$\tabularnewline
\hline 
\end{tabular}

\end{document}
